body_html:
I downgraded nvidia driver to 375.26 on my machine and it works for both TF 1.0.1 and TF 1.1.0, the latter was built from source.
@StefanoD @jart I suspect that this issue was caused by upgrading bazel tools. When I updated my bazel, it run into an error:
E: Failed to fetch http://developer.download.nvidia.com/compute/cuda/repos/ubuntu1404/x86_64/./nvidia-375_375.51-0ubuntu1_amd64.deb Size mismatch

The system can not find libcuda.so.375.26, because there is libcuda.so.375.51 in /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/ instead. When downgrading libcuda.so.375.51 to libcuda.so.375.26, it works well.

Wish this will help.

@StefanoD @jart I suspect that this issue was caused by upgrading bazel tools. When I updated my bazel, it run into an error:
E: Failed to fetch http://developer.download.nvidia.com/compute/cuda/repos/ubuntu1404/x86_64/./nvidia-375_375.51-0ubuntu1_amd64.deb  Size mismatch
The system can not find libcuda.so.375.26, because there is libcuda.so.375.51 in /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/ instead. When downgrading libcuda.so.375.51 to libcuda.so.375.26, it works well.
Wish this will help.
body:
I downgraded nvidia driver to 375.26 on my machine and it works for both TF 1.0.1 and TF 1.1.0, the latter was built from source.
 @StefanoD @jart I suspect that this issue was caused by upgrading bazel tools. When I updated my bazel, it run into an error:
`E: Failed to fetch http://developer.download.nvidia.com/compute/cuda/repos/ubuntu1404/x86_64/./nvidia-375_375.51-0ubuntu1_amd64.deb  Size mismatch`

The system can not find libcuda.so.375.26, because there is libcuda.so.375.51 in /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/ instead. When downgrading libcuda.so.375.51 to libcuda.so.375.26, it works well.

Wish this will help.
